prompt: In a secluded coastal hamlet, a pristine, ultramodern concept car captures the viewer's attention. Its sleek, aerodynamic bodywork is finished in a soothing matte turquoise, harmoniously contrasting against the rugged natural beauty of the ocean waves crashing against the rocky shore. The car is positioned on a narrow, undulating coastal road, which winds gracefully along the cliffâ€™s edge, offering an exhilarating view of the vast, sparkling sea. A sense of innovation and elegance is embodied in the car's glass canopy, which reflects the fragmented golden light of the setting sun. From a low-angle perspective, the camera captures the dynamic stance of the vehicle, emphasizing its aggressive lines and elongated silhouette. The framing centers the car in the composition, with the coastline receding in the background, establishing both depth and a dramatic juxtaposition between nature and engineering marvel. The gentle breeze carries with it the scent of salt and the distant call of seabirds, adding an element of tranquility to the robust visual depiction. As the evening's golden hour descends, the soft, warm light bathes the car and the surrounding landscape in an ethereal glow. The shadows cast by the cliffs playfully dance on the car's contours, enhancing its futuristic design features with subtle highlights. The color palette is dominated by the rich, warm tones of the sunset, interspersed with the cool blues and greens of the ocean, creating a balanced yet vibrant scene. The overall effect of the image is one of refined elegance and cutting-edge innovation, captured with the precision of professional automotive photography. The image boasts high resolution and sharp focus, capturing every meticulous detail from the car's intricate wheel design to the texture of the rocky cliff surfaces in the background.

description: A futuristic concept car is finished in a matte turquoise color.
The setting is a remote coastal area with rugged natural beauty.
Ocean waves are crashing against the rocky shore.
